theses.title: MSc Thesis - Characterizing Midair Handwriting in Virtual Reality
theses.description: Predicted ink placement when writing in midair and investigated how people prefer to write in midair. Developed a VR data-gathering application to use in human experiments. Then performed data processing and analysis, which led to training 72 models to predict the intention of midair handwriting. Resulted in overall 85% accuracy.

theses.title: BSc Thesis - Angle Dependent Visualization and Interaction of Data in Augmented Reality
theses.description: Mobile AR data visualization application with novel angle-dependent interaction methods.
